question: During a recent plane journey, you sat next to a businessman who owns a chain of restaurants. You talked to him and he suggested that you should contact him about a possible job in one of his restaurants. Write a letter to this businessman. In your letter, • remind him when and where you met • tell him what kind of job you are interested in • say why you think you would be suitable for the job
text: I am Karthi and located in Coimbatore. Hope you and your family all are doing well.

I am writing this letter to let you know  to remind our last trip from Chennai to Coimbatore. I think you won’t forget our very first meeting since we shared so many things during the journey. In our discussion, you mentioned that there is a requirement for Finance-Head in your Coimbatore Branch. You added that the responsibility should be more for that position and also informed me to share my profile if anyone is available. I am a Qualified Chartered Accountant and had an experience of over 7 years . I hope I am an eligible candidate for your requirements and If you are fine then I will share my profile for your review. I am very much interested to be a part of your organisation and working with you.
Thanks for your consideration and hope to get a positive response from your side.
